baseline_groups.claim_summary: ITT effect of deploying a doctor to a primary health center on 7-day neonatal mortality, in a cluster-RCT across health facilities in Kaduna State, Nigeria. Reghdfe OLS with strata FE, clustered at facility level.
baseline_groups.notes: Two baseline specs: run_001 (Table 4 Col 1, strata FE only, no controls, p=0.143) and run_002 (Table 4 Col 2, basic controls + quarter FE, p=0.056). The baseline without controls is not significant at conventional levels; with basic controls it is borderline significant at 10%. Both treatment arms (doctor and mlp) are included simultaneously.

global_notes: No changes to baseline group assignments relative to the surface. The surface correctly identified one baseline group covering the doctor arm effect on 7-day neonatal mortality. The mort30 outcome variant and doctor_only treatment variant are classified as core data construction variations within the same baseline group.
